name: start
description: Start the client.

name: stop
description: Stop the Client.

name: run
description: Start the client, idle the main script and finally stop the client.

name: restart
description: Restart the Client.

name: add_handler
description: Register an update handler.

name: remove_handler
description: Remove a previously-registered update handler.

name: stop_transmission
description: Stop downloading or uploading a file.

name: export_session_string
description: Export the current authorized session as a serialized string.

name: set_parse_mode
description: Set the parse mode to be used globally by the client.

name: idle
description: Block the main script execution until a signal is received.

name: compose
description: Run multiple clients at once.

name: send_message
description: Send text messages.

name: forward_messages
description: Forward messages of any kind.

name: copy_message
description: Copy messages of any kind.

name: copy_media_group
description: Copy a media group by providing one of the message ids.

name: send_photo
description: Send photos.

name: send_audio
description: Send audio files.

name: send_document
description: Send generic files.

name: send_sticker
description: Send static .webp or animated .tgs stickers.

name: send_video
description: Send video files.

name: send_animation
description: Send animation files (animation or H.264/MPEG-4 AVC video without sound).

name: send_voice
description: Send audio files.

name: send_video_note
description: Send video messages.

name: send_media_group
description: Send a group of photos or videos as an album.

name: send_location
description: Send points on the map.

name: send_venue
description: Send information about a venue.

name: send_contact
description: Send phone contacts.

name: send_cached_media
description: Send any media stored on the Telegram servers using a file_id.

name: send_reaction
description: Send a reaction to a message.

name: edit_message_text
description: Edit the text of messages.

name: edit_message_caption
description: Edit the caption of media messages.

name: edit_message_media
description: Edit animation, audio, document, photo or video messages.

name: edit_message_reply_markup
description: Edit only the reply markup of messages sent by the bot.

name: edit_inline_text
description: Edit the text of inline messages.

name: edit_inline_caption
description: Edit the caption of inline media messages.

name: edit_inline_media
description: Edit inline animation, audio, document, photo or video messages.

name: edit_inline_reply_markup
description: Edit only the reply markup of inline messages sent via the bot (for inline bots).

name: send_chat_action
description: Tell the other party that something is happening on your side.

name: delete_messages
description: Delete messages, including service messages.

name: get_messages
description: Get one or more messages from a chat by using message identifiers.

name: get_media_group
description: Get the media group a message belongs to.

name: get_chat_history
description: Get messages from a chat history.

name: get_chat_history_count
description: Get the total count of messages in a chat.

name: read_chat_history
description: Mark a chat's message history as read.

name: send_poll
description: Send a new poll.

name: vote_poll
description: Vote a poll.

name: stop_poll
description: Stop a poll which was sent by you.

name: retract_vote
description: Retract your vote in a poll.

name: send_dice
description: Send a dice with a random value from 1 to 6.

name: search_messages
description: Search for text and media messages inside a specific chat.

name: search_messages_count
description: Get the count of messages resulting from a search inside a chat.

name: search_global
description: Search messages globally from all of your chats.

name: search_global_count
description: Get the count of messages resulting from a global search.

name: download_media
description: Download the media from a message.

name: stream_media
description: Stream the media from a message chunk by chunk.

name: get_discussion_message
description: Get the first discussion message of a channel post or a discussion thread in a group.

name: get_discussion_replies
description: Get the message replies of a discussion thread.

name: get_discussion_replies_count
description: Get the total count of replies in a discussion thread.

name: get_custom_emoji_stickers
description: Get information about custom emoji stickers by their identifiers.

name: join_chat
description: Join a group chat or channel.

name: leave_chat
description: Leave a group chat or channel.

name: ban_chat_member
description: Ban a user from a group, a supergroup or a channel.

name: unban_chat_member
description: Unban a previously banned user in a supergroup or channel.

name: restrict_chat_member
description: Restrict a user in a supergroup.

name: promote_chat_member
description: Promote or demote a user in a supergroup or a channel.

name: set_administrator_title
description: Set a custom title (rank) to an administrator of a supergroup.

name: set_chat_photo
description: Set a new chat photo or video (H.264/MPEG-4 AVC video, max 5 seconds).

name: delete_chat_photo
description: Delete a chat photo.

name: set_chat_title
description: Change the title of a chat.

name: set_chat_description
description: Change the description of a supergroup or a channel.

name: set_chat_permissions
description: Set default chat permissions for all members.

name: pin_chat_message
description: Pin a message in a group, channel or your own chat.

name: unpin_chat_message
description: Unpin a message in a group, channel or your own chat.

name: unpin_all_chat_messages
description: Use this method to clear the list of pinned messages in a chat.

name: get_chat
description: Get up to date information about a chat.

name: get_chat_member
description: Get information about one member of a chat.

name: get_chat_members
description: Get the members list of a chat.

name: get_chat_members_count
description: Get the number of members in a chat.

name: get_dialogs
description: Get a user's dialogs sequentially.

name: get_dialogs_count
description: Get the total count of your dialogs.

name: set_chat_username
description: Set a channel or a supergroup username.

name: get_nearby_chats
description: Get nearby chats.

name: archive_chats
description: Archive one or more chats.

name: unarchive_chats
description: Unarchive one or more chats.

name: add_chat_members
description: Add new chat members to a group, supergroup or channel

name: create_channel
description: Create a new broadcast channel.

name: create_group
description: Create a new basic group.

name: create_supergroup
description: Create a new supergroup.

name: delete_channel
description: Delete a channel.

name: delete_supergroup
description: Delete a supergroup.

name: delete_user_history
description: Delete all messages sent by a certain user in a supergroup.

name: set_slow_mode
description: Set the slow mode interval for a chat.

name: mark_chat_unread
description: Mark a chat as unread.

name: get_chat_event_log
description: Get the actions taken by chat members and administrators in the last 48h.

name: get_chat_online_count
description: Get the number of members that are currently online in a chat.

name: get_send_as_chats
description: Get the list of "send_as" chats available.

name: set_send_as_chat
description: Set the default "send_as" chat for a chat.

name: set_chat_protected_content
description: Set the chat protected content setting.

name: get_me
description: Get your own user identity.

name: get_users
description: Get information about a user.

name: get_chat_photos
description: Get a chat or a user profile photos sequentially.

name: get_chat_photos_count
description: Get the total count of photos for a chat.

name: set_profile_photo
description: Set a new profile photo or video (H.264/MPEG-4 AVC video, max 5 seconds).

name: delete_profile_photos
description: Delete your own profile photos.

name: set_username
description: Set your own username.

name: update_profile
description: Update your profile details such as first name, last name and bio.

name: block_user
description: Block a user.

name: unblock_user
description: Unblock a user.

name: get_common_chats
description: Get the common chats you have with a user.

name: get_chat_invite_link
description: Get detailed information about a chat invite link.

name: export_chat_invite_link
description: Generate a new primary invite link for a chat; any previously generated primary link is revoked.

name: create_chat_invite_link
description: Create an additional invite link for a chat.

name: edit_chat_invite_link
description: Edit a non-primary invite link.

name: revoke_chat_invite_link
description: Revoke a previously created invite link.

name: delete_chat_invite_link
description: Delete an already revoked invite link.

name: get_chat_invite_link_joiners
description: Get the members who joined the chat with the invite link.

name: get_chat_invite_link_joiners_count
description: Get the count of the members who joined the chat with the invite link.

name: get_chat_admin_invite_links
description: Get the invite links created by an administrator in a chat.

name: get_chat_admin_invite_links_count
description: Get the count of the invite links created by an administrator in a chat.

name: get_chat_admins_with_invite_links
description: Get the list of the administrators that have exported invite links in a chat.

name: get_chat_join_requests
description: Get the pending join requests of a chat.

name: delete_chat_admin_invite_links
description: Delete all revoked invite links of an administrator.

name: approve_chat_join_request
description: Approve a chat join request.

name: approve_all_chat_join_requests
description: Approve all pending join requests in a chat.

name: decline_chat_join_request
description: Decline a chat join request.

name: decline_all_chat_join_requests
description: Decline all pending join requests in a chat.

name: add_contact
description: Add an existing Telegram user as contact, even without a phone number.

name: delete_contacts
description: Delete contacts from your Telegram address book.

name: import_contacts
description: Import contacts to your Telegram address book.

name: get_contacts
description: Get contacts from your Telegram address book.

name: get_contacts_count
description: Get the total count of contacts from your Telegram address book.

name: enable_cloud_password
description: Enable the Two-Step Verification security feature (Cloud Password) on your account.

name: change_cloud_password
description: Change your Two-Step Verification password (Cloud Password) with a new one.

name: remove_cloud_password
description: Turn off the Two-Step Verification security feature (Cloud Password) on your account.

name: get_inline_bot_results
description: Get bot results via inline queries.

name: send_inline_bot_result
description: Send an inline bot result.

name: answer_callback_query
description: Send answers to callback queries sent from inline keyboards.

name: answer_inline_query
description: Send answers to an inline query.

name: request_callback_answer
description: Request a callback answer from bots.

name: send_game
description: Send a game.

name: set_game_score
description: Set the score of the specified user in a game.

name: get_game_high_scores
description: Get data for high score tables.

name: set_bot_commands
description: Set the list of the bot's commands.

name: get_bot_commands
description: Get the current list of the bot's commands for the given scope and user language.

name: delete_bot_commands
description: Delete the list of the bot's commands for the given scope and user language.

name: set_bot_default_privileges
description: Change the default privileges requested by the bot when it's added as an administrator to groups or channels.

name: get_bot_default_privileges
description: Get the current default privileges of the bot.

name: set_chat_menu_button
description: Change the bot's menu button in a private chat, or the default menu button.

name: get_chat_menu_button
description: Get the current value of the bot's menu button in a private chat, or the default menu button.

name: answer_web_app_query
description: Set the result of an interaction with a Web App and send a corresponding message on behalf of the user to the chat from which the query originated.

name: connect
description: Connect the client to Telegram servers.

name: disconnect
description: Disconnect the client from Telegram servers.

name: initialize
description: Initialize the client by starting up workers.

name: terminate
description: Terminate the client by shutting down workers.

name: send_code
description: Send the confirmation code to the given phone number.

name: resend_code
description: Re-send the confirmation code using a different type.

name: sign_in
description: Authorize a user in Telegram with a valid confirmation code.

name: sign_in_bot
description: Authorize a bot using its bot token generated by BotFather.

name: sign_up
description: Register a new user in Telegram.

name: get_password_hint
description: Get your Two-Step Verification password hint.

name: check_password
description: Check your Two-Step Verification password and log in.

name: send_recovery_code
description: Send a code to your email to recover your password.

name: recover_password
description: Recover your password with a recovery code and log in.

name: accept_terms_of_service
description: Accept the given terms of service.

name: log_out
description: Log out from Telegram and delete the *.session file.

name: invoke
description: Invoke raw Telegram functions.

name: resolve_peer
description: Get the InputPeer of a known peer id.

name: save_file
description: Upload a file onto Telegram servers, without actually sending the message to anyone.
